children.name:
AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  01:57:41Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     169  10.152.183.109  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s                 0  10.152.183.81   no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.237  no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.178.77         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.178.74         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.178.75         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.178.78         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.178.72         
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  01:57:41Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     169  10.152.183.109  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s                 0  10.152.183.81   no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.237  no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.178.77         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.178.74         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.178.75         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.178.78         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.178.72         
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f53754cd030>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f53754cd030> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f53752b3670>.model
